alert.note: Alert for Matanuska Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 10 at 4:58AM AKST until December 12 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches possible. * WHERE...Matanuska Valley. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and afternoon commute Monday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will begin Sunday afternoon across much of the Matanuska Valley. The heaviest snow is currently expected from late Sunday night through Monday morning before gradually diminishing Monday afternoon. Highest snowfall totals look to be generally north and east of Sutton and from Wasilla westward.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
